summary: What are your thoughts on a world where Arya is Wardeness of the North and Sansa is Lady of Winterfell? I saw someone on reddit...
question: What are your thoughts on a world where Arya is Wardeness of the North and Sansa is Lady of Winterfell? I saw someone on reddit speculate about it since Sansa is currently v much higher than her sister in role and title, and that would even the playing field. It could even work in book canon, with them playing the roles for either a young Rickon or Bran (although if it was  Bran, Sansa's role would obviously be more Lady Stark than Lord Stark -esque).
answer: I don’t see either of them taking authority positions over their brothers at the moment. First of all, they’re all super close in age; there’s no need for them to assume power when Bran is nearly as old, and has actual experienced people around him to help. Second, neither girl has the experience that Bran has to be able to take on those roles over him. Bran has actually dealt with the politics of Winterfell firsthand as acting lord. Nothing Sansa or Arya can do will trump that experience or knowledge. Third of all, Jon is (or will be, if we’re talking the books) alive, and he has extensive experience in leadership and northern-based politics. Sticking Arya and Sansa in these roles (at least right now) makes zero sense when their remaining brothers have a combined political career that has dealt with battle, food rations, delegation, execution, sacrifice, negotiations, etc.

Third of all, Jon is (or will be, if we’re talking the books) alive, and he has extensive experience in leadership and northern-based politics. Sticking Arya and Sansa in these roles (at least right now) makes zero sense when their remaining brothers have a combined political career that has dealt with battle, food rations, delegation, execution, sacrifice, negotiations, etc.

First of all, they’re all super close in age; there’s no need for them to assume power when Bran is nearly as old, and has actual experienced people around him to help. summary: What do you think is the best/most positive trait of each Stark pre-ASOIAF/early GOT (+ Theon; including dead ones)?
question: What do you think is the best/most positive trait of each Stark pre-ASOIAF/early GOT (+ Theon; including dead ones)?
answer:
I’m just going to do Ned’s generation, his children, and Theon!

Brandon: his wild fury; unfortunately it’s something that the Mad King kills him for, but the utter hurricane that was his love for his sister is just so beautiful—you have a man about to be married but instead he storms into King’s Landing, metaphorical guns blazing, all to save his little sister

Ned: his loyalty; what he does for his sister is so beautiful, and it’s informed by the utter devotion with which he navigates that relationship (when Lyanna is dead and alive)—he raises Jon as his own son, teaching and giving him all that he is able to, to the detriment of his own matrimonial peace

Benjen: his sacrificial nature; it’s implied he joined the Night’s Watch because of what happened to his sister, brother, and father—a young boy (with a place in Winterfell) willingly sends himself away to the freezing Wall for the rest of his life; we can see this nature shine through when he laments that Jon is not his son

Lyanna: her kindness; one of my favorite stories about her is when she helped Howland Reed—this was a man she didn’t know, but she stood up for him, clothed him, befriended him, when she had absolutely no obligation to; in fact, she likely would have been advised against doing so given her political stature

Robb: political savvy; of course (from our perspective) it sucks that he was not willing to trade Jaime for his sisters, but that was an unbelievably hard (and smart) decision to make—Robb deeply loves his family, but he also knows he must take care of his people, and he doesn’t allow his own desires (in this moment) to outrank those of his followers

Jon: I love how he’s this patchwork doll of the previous generation’s best qualities—the sacrificial nature, the kindness toward those considered beneath him, his loyalty, his wildness; above all, I think his pragmatism is his best quality; Jon is crazy smart, analytical, logical, all the makings of a formidable leader

Sansa: her adaptation; objectively, I love (and root for) how Sansa lies to protect herself in these situations where she is isolated from family and friends—it’s that feeling akin to watching a horror movie, when you’re begging the character to just be smart; I’ve felt like that many times especially when Sansa was with Joffrey, like “Just say what you have to to please him”

Arya: her Machiavellinism; like shit, her intelligence and creativity make for a wicked combination, and we can the fruits of this cunning in how she tricked Jaqen, how she found out about the kindly man when she was blind, how she executed her Mercy murder, etc.—its almost disturbing how able she is to amalgamate her smarts and her imagination to produce this knife-sharp guile

Bran: his sweetness; it would be so easy for the world to strip him of this, especially in light of losing the function of his legs, but Bran remains so, so sweet to those he loves—Luwin and Hodor and Osha, he just possesses this sweetness that is rare in that kind of world and I think it’s a beautiful thing to have

Rickon: we know little about him, but his wildness is almost unparalleled, but it’s so admirable; he really embraces that wild wolf part of him, allows Shaggy’s presence to protect him from harm, both physical and emotional—it’s probably not purposeful as he’s so young, but that ingrained dual-consciousness only makes his wildness better

Theon: his love for Robb; he betrays him of course, but I love seeing how often Theon thinks of Robb—his brother at heart—how he regrets leaving him, letting him die alone; it’s one of the best (platonic) love stories in ASOIAF in my opinion

summary: I'm honestly so hyped for the Arya X Jon X Bran family reunion more then anything 👏🏾♥️
body:
I’m honestly so hyped for the Arya X Jon X Bran family reunion more then anything 👏🏾♥️

(no shade) but they never treated Jon like an outcast and a outsider like some people (👀). They really looked up to my BOI and loved him dearly. 💖💖 It’s gonna seriously DESTROY ME when they all run up and hug one another 😂 in s8

Who knows? maybe homeboi bran might magically walk again just to get up and hug Jon. 😂 or even crack a smile lmao.

Anything can happen 😁

summary:
sansa: “What happens if you put a werewolf on the moon” is a great question. Probably the best question ever.
Bran: he’d explode...
body:
sansa: “What happens if you put a werewolf on the moon” is a great question. Probably the best question ever.

Bran: he’d explode and die because there’s no oxygen on the moon.

arya: We never said we’d send him up without a suit, you absolute monster.

blog.name: incorrect-got-quotes
blog.title: Dead, almost like my interest in the show
blog.description: I post quotes when I feel like it. Mostly nowadays I don’t.If you want to use one of the quotes as a story or drawing prompt, I'm fine with that, as long as you credit me in your story or art. Also, tag any drawings under #oberyn’s saucy art. Yes, I am in fact Oberyn Martell. For those on mobile, here is my ship list: https://incorrect-got-quotes.tumblr.com/list-of-ships Main: garnetislovegarnetislife. SUBMISSION BOX IS (MOST LIKELY) PERMANENTLY CLOSED!

summary:
Sansa: Remember that one time when we were all happy and no one was suffering?
Bran: Naw, my memory can’t go back that far in...
body:
Sansa: Remember that one time when we were all happy and no one was suffering?
Bran: Naw, my memory can’t go back that far in time.

dialogue.phrase: Remember that one time when we were all happy and no one was suffering?

dialogue.name: Bran
dialogue.label: Bran:
dialogue.phrase: Naw, my memory can’t go back that far in time.

blog.description: Like a woman about to go forth in SIN -  this blog does contain NSFW posts

title: Heeeeyyyy
body: Hey guys! It’s me, your mum. I deleted my main! I know! Crazy…after all these years. I needed a change. Please follow this blog now for all the Isaac goodness. It’s a pretty dead and barren place in his fandom currently, but I will always post updates when I can. Just remember, this is a side blog now, and I cannot follow you back on here, but feel free to follow my main now @millkycat
